idea:

idea:
HII Iam Ashraf Mansoori, Founder & CEO of ASHASWEB PRIVATE LIMITED. I have started my journey in 2018 with some of my friends, when i was 18 year old. I have created and build many brands & websites. For example: Quearn.com & Chatie.in


What is quearn? 


Well Quearn is a social questions & Answers Engine which will help you establish your community and connect with other people, Also you Can Earn Money (It has already launched and getting daily 10k+ users, did more than 2.5lakh+Questions & 3lakh+ answers)


What is Chatie?


Chatie is a social media platform similar to twitter. I always thought that "Yaar India ka bhi apna social media platform hona chahiye" that's why i started this 2 months ago(Still it is under development soon gonna launch it)


Also we are into Software development field, we do software app development, web development, SEO & Each thing which comes under IT.


I have a lots of Ideas & plans. Im not just a thinker Iam a action taker.
name: ASHASWEB PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
Tender Impulse is a limited liability firm operating in the service sector catering to worldwide clients providing them with information in the public procurement domain.

Tender Impulse provides unique services to its clients by offering them first hand information on tenders, bids, RFP's, contracts and upcoming projects from the public procurement domain.

idea:
Genie Bazaar is on stop platform your B2B needs, which we have innovated in such a way that vendor selection to Vendor Settlement will get manages in a click,  and providing an integrated platform for procurement of products and services across India with budget management, catalog management, and approval workflows, Ready Invoicing, CRM and much more just at  www.geniebazaar.com.

We automate the full buying cycle of corporate and residential clients, from product research, Vendor Selection and purchase and payment, to asset maintenance, repair and recycling. We focus on delivering a ruthlessly efficient, lightening quick, and transparent experience while doing so. We are expert of what we do and what we cater.What we are working on has the potential to affect 95% of procurement practices in India.
name: GENIE BAZAAR PRIVATE LIMITED
